computedFields.label: IsClosed
computedFields.name: IsClosed
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when date(ActivityDate_Year,ActivityDate_Month,ActivityDate_Day) in ["1 year ago".."current day"] then "false" else "true" end

computedFields.label: EndDateTime
computedFields.name: EndDateTime
computedFields.saqlExpression: now()

computedFields.label: Type

computedFields.saqlExpression: "User"

computedFields.name: SundayStartTimeDate
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'SundayStartTime' is null then toDate("3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z","yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") else toDate("2000-01-01T"+'SundayStartTime',"yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") end

computedFields.name: SundayEndTimeDate
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'SundayEndTime' is null then toDate("3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z","yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") else toDate("2000-01-01T"+'SundayEndTime',"yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") end

computedFields.name: MondayStartTimeDate
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'MondayStartTime' is null then toDate("3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z","yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") else toDate("2000-01-01T"+'MondayStartTime',"yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") end

computedFields.name: MondayEndTimeDate
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'MondayEndTime' is null then toDate("3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z","yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") else toDate("2000-01-01T"+'MondayEndTime',"yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") end

computedFields.name: WednesdayStartTimeDate

computedFields.name: WednesdayEndTimeDate

computedFields.name: ThursdayEndTimeDate
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'ThursdayEndTime' is null then toDate("3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z","yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") else toDate("2000-01-01T"+'ThursdayEndTime',"yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") end

computedFields.name: FridayStartTimeDate
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'FridayStartTime' is null then toDate("3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z","yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") else toDate("2000-01-01T"+'FridayStartTime',"yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") end

computedFields.name: FridayEndTimeDate
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'FridayEndTime' is null then toDate("3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z","yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") else toDate("2000-01-01T"+'FridayEndTime',"yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") end

computedFields.name: SaturdayEndTimeDate
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'SaturdayEndTime' is null then toDate("3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z","yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") else toDate("2000-01-01T"+'SaturdayEndTime',"yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") end

computedFields.name: SundayDuration
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('SundayEndTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z" or 'SundayStartTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z") then 0 when ('SundayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' == 'SundayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch') then 86400 else 'SundayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' - 'SundayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch' end
computedFields.label: Sunday Duration

computedFields.name: MondayDuration
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('MondayEndTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z" or 'MondayStartTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z") then 0 when ('MondayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' == 'MondayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch') then 86400 else 'MondayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' - 'MondayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch' end
computedFields.label: Monday Duration

computedFields.name: TuesdayDuration
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('TuesdayEndTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z" or 'TuesdayStartTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z") then 0 when ('TuesdayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' == 'TuesdayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch') then 86400 else 'TuesdayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' - 'TuesdayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch' end
computedFields.label: Tuesday Duration

computedFields.name: WednesdayDuration
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('WednesdayEndTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z" or 'WednesdayStartTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z") then 0 when ('WednesdayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' == 'WednesdayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch') then 86400 else 'WednesdayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' - 'WednesdayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch' end
computedFields.label: Wednesday Duration

computedFields.name: ThursdayDuration
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('ThursdayEndTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z" or 'ThursdayStartTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z") then 0 when ('ThursdayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' == 'ThursdayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch') then 86400 else 'ThursdayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' - 'ThursdayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch' end
computedFields.label: Thursday Duration

computedFields.name: FridayDuration
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('FridayEndTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z" or 'FridayStartTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z") then 0 when ('FridayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' == 'FridayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch') then 86400 else 'FridayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' - 'FridayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch' end
computedFields.label: Friday Duration

computedFields.name: SaturdayDuration
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('SaturdayEndTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z" or 'SaturdayStartTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z") then 0 when ('SaturdayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' == 'SaturdayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch') then 86400 else 'SaturdayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' - 'SaturdayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch' end
computedFields.label: Saturday Duration

computedFields.name: SundayStartTime_sec
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('SundayEndTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z" or 'SundayStartTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z") then 0 when ('SundayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' == 'SundayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch') then 0 else 'SundayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch' - 'SundayStartTimeDate_day_epoch'*86400 end
computedFields.label: Sunday Start Time

computedFields.name: MondayStartTime_sec
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('MondayEndTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z" or 'MondayStartTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z") then 0 when ('MondayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' == 'MondayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch') then 0 else 'MondayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch' - 'MondayStartTimeDate_day_epoch'*86400 end

computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('TuesdayEndTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z" or 'TuesdayStartTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z") then 0 when ('TuesdayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' == 'TuesdayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch') then 0 else 'TuesdayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch' - 'TuesdayStartTimeDate_day_epoch'*86400 end
computedFields.label: Tuesday Start Time

computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('WednesdayEndTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z" or 'WednesdayStartTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z") then 0 when ('WednesdayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' == 'WednesdayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch') then 0 else 'WednesdayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch' - 'WednesdayStartTimeDate_day_epoch'*86400 end
computedFields.label: Wednesday Start Time

computedFields.name: ThursdayStartTime_sec
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('ThursdayEndTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z" or 'ThursdayStartTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z") then 0 when ('ThursdayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' == 'ThursdayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch') then 0 else 'ThursdayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch' - 'ThursdayStartTimeDate_day_epoch'*86400 end
computedFields.label: Thursday Start Time

computedFields.name: FridayStartTime_sec
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('FridayEndTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z" or 'FridayStartTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z") then 0 when ('FridayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' == 'FridayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch') then 0 else 'FridayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch' - 'FridayStartTimeDate_day_epoch'*86400 end
computedFields.label: Friday Start Time

computedFields.name: SaturdayStartTime_sec
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('SaturdayEndTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z" or 'SaturdayStartTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z") then 0 when ('SaturdayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' == 'SaturdayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch') then 0 else 'SaturdayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch' - 'SaturdayStartTimeDate_day_epoch'*86400 end
computedFields.label: Saturday Start Time

computedFields.name: SundayEndTime_sec
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('SundayEndTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z" or 'SundayStartTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z") then 0 when ('SundayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' == 'SundayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch') then 86400 else 'SundayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' - 'SundayEndTimeDate_day_epoch'*86400 end
computedFields.label: Sunday End Time

computedFields.name: MondayEndTime_sec
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('MondayEndTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z" or 'MondayStartTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z") then 0 when ('MondayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' == 'MondayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch') then 86400 else 'MondayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' - 'MondayEndTimeDate_day_epoch'*86400 end
computedFields.label: Monday End Time

computedFields.name: TuesdayEndTime_sec
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('TuesdayEndTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z" or 'TuesdayStartTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z") then 0 when ('TuesdayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' == 'TuesdayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch') then 86400 else 'TuesdayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' - 'TuesdayEndTimeDate_day_epoch'*86400 end
computedFields.label: Tuesday End Time

computedFields.name: WednesdayEndTime_sec
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('WednesdayEndTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z" or 'WednesdayStartTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z") then 0 when ('WednesdayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' == 'WednesdayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch') then 86400 else 'WednesdayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' - 'WednesdayEndTimeDate_day_epoch'*86400 end
computedFields.label: Wednesday End Time

computedFields.name: ThursdayEndTime_sec
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('ThursdayEndTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z" or 'ThursdayStartTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z") then 0 when ('ThursdayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' == 'ThursdayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch') then 86400 else 'ThursdayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' - 'ThursdayEndTimeDate_day_epoch'*86400 end
computedFields.label: Thursday End Time

computedFields.name: FridayEndTime_sec
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('FridayEndTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z" or 'FridayStartTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z") then 0 when ('FridayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' == 'FridayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch') then 86400 else 'FridayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' - 'FridayEndTimeDate_day_epoch'*86400 end
computedFields.label: Friday End Time

computedFields.name: SaturdayEndTime_sec
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('SaturdayEndTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z" or 'SaturdayStartTimeDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z") then 0 when ('SaturdayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' == 'SaturdayStartTimeDate_sec_epoch') then 86400 else 'SaturdayEndTimeDate_sec_epoch' - 'SaturdayEndTimeDate_day_epoch'*86400 end
computedFields.label: Saturday End Time

computedFields.name: DuplicateOwnerRecords
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'NewOwnerID.Name' is not null or  'Field' == "created" or 'Field' == "${Constants.CaseStatus}" then "true" else "false" end
computedFields.label: Non Null fields?

expression.saqlExpression: case when 'Field' == "Owner" or 'Field' == "created" then toDate(current('CreatedDate_sec_epoch')) else coalesce(previous('OwnerPreviousChangeDate'), toDate(current('CreatedDate_sec_epoch'))) end

case when 'Field' == "${Constants.CaseStatus}" or 'Field' == "created" then toDate(current('CreatedDate_sec_epoch')) else coalesce(previous('StatusPreviousChangeDate'), toDate(current('CreatedDate_sec_epoch'))) end
case when 'Field' == "Owner" or 'Field' == "created" then toDate(current('CreatedDate_sec_epoch')) else coalesce(previous('OwnerNextChangeDate'), now()) end
case when 'Field' == "${Constants.CaseStatus}" or 'Field' == "created" then toDate(current('CreatedDate_sec_epoch')) else coalesce(previous('StatusNextChangeDate'), now()) end

case when 'Field' == "${Constants.CaseStatus}" then current('OldValue') when 'Field' == "created" then coalesce(previous('StatusPreviousValue'), "created") else coalesce(previous('StatusPreviousValue'), null) end
case when 'Field' == "Owner" then current('OldValue') when 'Field' == "created" then previous('OwnerPreviousValue') else coalesce(previous('OwnerPreviousValue'), null) end

case when 'Field' == "${Constants.CaseStatus}" then current('NewValue') when 'Field' == "created" then coalesce(previous('StatusPreviousValue'), "created") else coalesce(previous('StatusValue'), null) end
case when 'Field' == "Owner" then current('NewValue') when 'Field' == "created" then previous('OwnerPreviousValue') else coalesce(previous('OwnerValue'), null) end
coalesce(toDate(previous('OwnerPreviousChangeDate_sec_epoch')), toDate(current('Case.CreatedDate_sec_epoch')))
coalesce(toDate(previous('StatusPreviousChangeDate_sec_epoch')), toDate(current('Case.CreatedDate_sec_epoch')))
coalesce(toDate(next('OwnerNextChangeDate_sec_epoch')), now())
coalesce(toDate(next('StatusNextChangeDate_sec_epoch')), now())
case when 'Field' == "Owner" then 'NewOwnerID.Name' else coalesce(previous('NewOwnerWithCreated'),'NewValue') end
case when 'Field' == "${Constants.CaseStatus}" then 'NewValue' when 'Field' == "created" then 'Field' else coalesce(previous('NewStatusWithCreated'),'NewValue') end

computedFields.name: ValidToDate
computedFields.label: ValidToDate
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Field' == "Owner" then toDate('OwnerNextDate_sec_epoch') when 'Field' == "${Constants.CaseStatus}" then toDate('StatusNextDate_sec_epoch') else toDate('StatusNextDate_sec_epoch') end

computedFields.name: CreatedDatePrev
computedFields.label: CreatedDatePrev
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Field' == "Owner" then toDate('OwnerPreviousDate_sec_epoch') when 'Field' == "${Constants.CaseStatus}" then toDate('StatusPreviousDate_sec_epoch') else toDate('StatusPreviousDate_sec_epoch') end

computedFields.label: Opportunity Record Type
computedFields.name: RecordTypeName
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when RecordTypeId is null then "N/A" else 'RecordType.Name' end

computedFields.label: Case Record Type
computedFields.name: RecordTypeName
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when RecordTypeId is null then "N/A" else 'RecordType.Name' end

computedFields.label: Is Activity
computedFields.name: IsActivity
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Case.Id' is null then "No" else "Yes" end

computedFields.label: Is Call
computedFields.name: IsCall
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when CallDurationInSeconds > 0 then "Yes" else "No" end

computedFields.name: ActivityIsClosed
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('Type' == "Task" && 'IsClosed' == "true") ||  ('Case.CurrentDate_sec_epoch' > 'EndDateTime_sec_epoch') then "Completed" when ('Type' == "Task" && 'IsClosed' == "false") then "Open" else "Open" end
computedFields.label: Activity Is Closed
Is Activity
computedFields.name: IsActivity
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Case.Id' is null then "No" else "Yes" end

computedFields.label: Is Call
computedFields.name: IsCall
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when CallDurationInSeconds > 0 then "Yes" else "No" end

computedFields.label: ActivityType
computedFields.name: ActivityType
computedFields.saqlExpression: TaskSubtype

computedFields.name: ActivityIsClosed
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'IsClosed' == "true" then "Completed" else "Open" end
computedFields.label: Activity Is Closed
Last LastModifiedDate
computedFields.name: sum_last_activity
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('Task.ActivityLastModifiedDate_sec_epoch' > 'Event.ActivityLastModifiedDate_sec_epoch' && 'Task.ActivityLastModifiedDate_sec_epoch' >= 'LastModifiedDate_sec_epoch') then  ('CurrentDate_sec_epoch' - 'Task.ActivityLastModifiedDate_sec_epoch')/86400 when ('Event.ActivityLastModifiedDate_sec_epoch' > 'Task.ActivityLastModifiedDate_sec_epoch' && 'Event.ActivityLastModifiedDate_sec_epoch' >= 'LastModifiedDate_sec_epoch') then ('CurrentDate_sec_epoch' - 'Event.ActivityLastModifiedDate_sec_epoch')/86400  when ('LastModifiedDate_sec_epoch' >= 'Task.ActivityLastModifiedDate_sec_epoch' && 'LastModifiedDate_sec_epoch' >= 'Event.ActivityLastModifiedDate_sec_epoch') then ('CurrentDate_sec_epoch' - 'LastModifiedDate_sec_epoch')/86400  else ('CurrentDate_sec_epoch' - 'LastModifiedDate_sec_epoch')/86400 end

computedFields.label: Last LastModifiedDate
computedFields.name: sum_last_activity
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('Task.ActivityLastModifiedDate_sec_epoch' >= 'LastModifiedDate_sec_epoch') then ('CurrentDate_sec_epoch' - 'Task.ActivityLastModifiedDate_sec_epoch')/86400 when ('LastModifiedDate_sec_epoch' >= 'Task.ActivityLastModifiedDate_sec_epoch') then ('CurrentDate_sec_epoch' - 'LastModifiedDate_sec_epoch')/86400  else ('CurrentDate_sec_epoch' - 'LastModifiedDate_sec_epoch')/86400 end

computedFields.label: is Attached By Owner?
computedFields.name: isAttachedByOwner
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'CreatedById' == 'Article.CreatedById' then "true" else "false" end

computedFields.label: Is Draft
computedFields.name: IsDraft
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'ArticleVersion.Id' is null then "true" else "false" end

computedFields.label: Channel List
computedFields.name: ChannelList
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInApp' == "false" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPrm' == "false" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInCsp' == "false" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPkb' == "true" ) then "Public" when ('ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInApp' == "false" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPrm' == "false" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInCsp' == "true" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPkb' == "false" ) then "Customer" when ('ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInApp' == "false" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPrm' == "false" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInCsp' == "true" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPkb' == "true" ) then "Customer;Public" when ('ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInApp' == "false" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPrm' == "true" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInCsp' == "false" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPkb' == "false" ) then "Parter" when ('ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInApp' == "false" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPrm' == "true" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInCsp' == "false" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPkb' == "true" ) then "Parter;Public" when ('ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInApp' == "false" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPrm' == "true" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInCsp' == "true" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPkb' == "false" ) then "Parter;Customer"    when ('ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInApp' == "false" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPrm' == "true" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInCsp' == "true" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPkb' == "true" ) then "Parter;Customer;Public" when ('ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInApp' == "true" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPrm' == "false" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInCsp' == "false" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPkb' == "false" ) then "Internal" when ('ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInApp' == "true" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPrm' == "false" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInCsp' == "false" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPkb' == "true" ) then "Internal;Public" when ('ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInApp' == "true" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPrm' == "false" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInCsp' == "true" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPkb' == "false" ) then "Internal;Customer" when ('ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInApp' == "true" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPrm' == "false" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInCsp' == "true" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPkb' == "true" ) then "Internal;Customer;Public" when ('ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInApp' == "true" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPrm' == "true" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInCsp' == "false" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPkb' == "false" ) then "Internal;Parter" when ('ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInApp' == "true" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPrm' == "true" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInCsp' == "false" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPkb' == "true" ) then "Internal;Parter;Public" when ('ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInApp' == "true" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPrm' == "true" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInCsp' == "true" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPkb' == "false" ) then "Internal;Parter;Customer" when ('ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInApp' == "true" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPrm' == "true" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInCsp' == "true" && 'ArticleVersion.IsVisibleInPkb' == "true" ) then "Internal;Parter;Customer;Public" end

computedFields.label: Case Duration
computedFields.name: DurationCalculatedField
computedFields.saqlExpression: case  when ('IsClosed' == "true") then ('ClosedDate_sec_epoch' - 'CreatedDate_sec_epoch')/86400   else ('CurrentDate_sec_epoch' - 'CreatedDate_sec_epoch')/86400  end

computedFields.name: NumWeeks
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('ValidToWithNow_day_epoch' - 'CreatedDate_day_epoch')< 2 then 0 else ('ValidToWithNow_day_epoch' - 'CreatedDate_day_epoch')/7 end

computedFields.name: StartWeekDay
computedFields.saqlExpression: 'CreatedDate_day_epoch'%7

computedFields.name: EndWeekDay
computedFields.saqlExpression: 'ValidToWithNow_day_epoch'%7

computedFields.name: TotalThursdayDuration
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ( ('EndWeekDay' < 'StartWeekDay') and ((0 < 'EndWeekDay') or (('StartWeekDay' < 0) and (0 < ('EndWeekDay'+7))))) or ('StartWeekDay' != 'EndWeekDay' && ('StartWeekDay' < 0 && 0< 'EndWeekDay')) then  'BH.ThursdayDuration'*('NumWeeks' + 1) else 'BH.ThursdayDuration'*'NumWeeks' end

computedFields.name: TotalFridayDuration
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ( ('EndWeekDay' < 'StartWeekDay') and ((1 < 'EndWeekDay') or (('StartWeekDay' < 1) and (1 < ('EndWeekDay'+7))))) or ('StartWeekDay' != 'EndWeekDay' && ('StartWeekDay' < 1 && 1< 'EndWeekDay')) then 'BH.FridayDuration'*('NumWeeks' + 1) else 'BH.FridayDuration'*'NumWeeks' end

computedFields.name: TotalSaturdayDuration
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ( ('EndWeekDay' < 'StartWeekDay') and ((2 < 'EndWeekDay') or (('StartWeekDay' < 2) and (2 < ('EndWeekDay'+7))))) or ('StartWeekDay' != 'EndWeekDay' && ('StartWeekDay' < 2 && 2< 'EndWeekDay')) then 'BH.SaturdayDuration'*('NumWeeks' + 1) else 'BH.SaturdayDuration'*'NumWeeks' end

computedFields.name: TotalSundayDuration
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ( ('EndWeekDay' < 'StartWeekDay') and ((3 < 'EndWeekDay') or (('StartWeekDay' < 3) and (3 < ('EndWeekDay'+7))))) or ('StartWeekDay' != 'EndWeekDay' && ('StartWeekDay' < 3 && 3< 'EndWeekDay')) then 'BH.SundayDuration'*('NumWeeks' + 1) else 'BH.SundayDuration'*'NumWeeks' end

computedFields.name: TotalMondayDuration
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ( ('EndWeekDay' < 'StartWeekDay') and ((4 < 'EndWeekDay') or (('StartWeekDay' < 4) and (4 < ('EndWeekDay'+7))))) or ('StartWeekDay' != 'EndWeekDay' && ('StartWeekDay' < 4 && 4< 'EndWeekDay')) then 'BH.MondayDuration'*('NumWeeks' + 1) else 'BH.MondayDuration'*'NumWeeks' end

computedFields.name: TotalTuesdayDuration
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ( ('EndWeekDay' < 'StartWeekDay') and ((5 < 'EndWeekDay') or (('StartWeekDay' < 5) and (5 < ('EndWeekDay'+7))))) or ('StartWeekDay' != 'EndWeekDay' && ('StartWeekDay' < 5 && 5< 'EndWeekDay')) then 'BH.TuesdayDuration'*('NumWeeks' + 1) else 'BH.TuesdayDuration'*'NumWeeks' end

computedFields.name: TotalWednesdayDuration
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ( ('EndWeekDay' < 'StartWeekDay') and ((6 < 'EndWeekDay') or (('StartWeekDay' < 6) and (6 < ('EndWeekDay'+7))))) or ('StartWeekDay' != 'EndWeekDay' && ('StartWeekDay' < 6 && 6< 'EndWeekDay')) then 'BH.WednesdayDuration'*('NumWeeks' + 1) else 'BH.WednesdayDuration'*'NumWeeks' end

computedFields.name: BusinessCreateDateStartTimeInSeconds
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'StartWeekDay' == 0 then 'BH.ThursdayStartTime_sec' when 'StartWeekDay' == 1 then 'BH.FridayStartTime_sec' when 'StartWeekDay' == 2 then 'BH.SaturdayStartTime_sec' when 'StartWeekDay' == 3 then 'BH.SundayStartTime_sec' when 'StartWeekDay' == 4 then 'BH.MondayStartTime_sec' when 'StartWeekDay' == 5 then 'BH.TuesdayStartTime_sec' when 'StartWeekDay' == 6 then 'BH.WednesdayStartTime_sec' else 'BH.WednesdayStartTime_sec' end

computedFields.name: BusinessCreateDateEndTimeInSeconds
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'StartWeekDay' == 0 then 'BH.ThursdayEndTime_sec' when 'StartWeekDay' == 1 then 'BH.FridayEndTime_sec' when 'StartWeekDay' == 2 then 'BH.SaturdayEndTime_sec' when 'StartWeekDay' == 3 then 'BH.SundayEndTime_sec' when 'StartWeekDay' == 4 then 'BH.MondayEndTime_sec' when 'StartWeekDay' == 5 then 'BH.TuesdayEndTime_sec' when 'StartWeekDay' == 6 then 'BH.WednesdayEndTime_sec' else 'BH.WednesdayEndTime_sec' end

computedFields.name: BusinessValidToStartTimeInSeconds
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'EndWeekDay' == 0 then 'BH.ThursdayStartTime_sec' when 'EndWeekDay' == 1 then 'BH.FridayStartTime_sec' when 'EndWeekDay' == 2 then 'BH.SaturdayStartTime_sec' when 'EndWeekDay' == 3 then 'BH.SundayStartTime_sec' when 'EndWeekDay' == 4 then 'BH.MondayStartTime_sec' when 'EndWeekDay' == 5 then 'BH.TuesdayStartTime_sec' when 'EndWeekDay' == 6 then 'BH.WednesdayStartTime_sec' else 'BH.WednesdayStartTime_sec' end

computedFields.name: BusinessValidToEndTimeInSeconds
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'EndWeekDay' == 0 then 'BH.ThursdayEndTime_sec' when 'EndWeekDay' == 1 then 'BH.FridayEndTime_sec' when 'EndWeekDay' == 2 then 'BH.SaturdayEndTime_sec' when 'EndWeekDay' == 3 then 'BH.SundayEndTime_sec' when 'EndWeekDay' == 4 then 'BH.MondayEndTime_sec' when 'EndWeekDay' == 5 then 'BH.TuesdayEndTime_sec' when 'EndWeekDay' == 6 then 'BH.WednesdayEndTime_sec' else 'BH.WednesdayEndTime_sec' end

computedFields.name: StartTimeAdjusted
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when (('CreatedDate_sec_epoch'-('CreatedDate_day_epoch'*86400)) > 'BusinessCreateDateEndTimeInSeconds') then 'BusinessCreateDateEndTimeInSeconds' when (('CreatedDate_sec_epoch'-('CreatedDate_day_epoch'*86400)) < 'BusinessCreateDateStartTimeInSeconds') then 'BusinessCreateDateStartTimeInSeconds' else ('CreatedDate_sec_epoch'-('CreatedDate_day_epoch'*86400)) end

computedFields.name: EndTimeAdjusted
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when (('ValidToWithNow_sec_epoch'-('ValidToWithNow_day_epoch'*86400)) > 'BusinessValidToEndTimeInSeconds') then 'BusinessValidToEndTimeInSeconds' when (('ValidToWithNow_sec_epoch'-('ValidToWithNow_day_epoch'*86400)) < 'BusinessValidToStartTimeInSeconds') then 'BusinessValidToStartTimeInSeconds' else ('ValidToWithNow_sec_epoch'-('ValidToWithNow_day_epoch'*86400)) end

computedFields.name: PartialDaysDurationStart
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('ValidToWithNow_day_epoch' == 'CreatedDate_day_epoch') then 0 else 'BusinessCreateDateEndTimeInSeconds' - 'StartTimeAdjusted' end

computedFields.name: PartialDaysDurationEnd
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('ValidToWithNow_day_epoch' == 'CreatedDate_day_epoch') then 'EndTimeAdjusted' - 'StartTimeAdjusted' else 'EndTimeAdjusted' - 'BusinessValidToStartTimeInSeconds' end

computedFields.name: BusinessHours
computedFields.saqlExpression: ('PartialDaysDurationStart'+ 'PartialDaysDurationEnd'+ 'TotalThursdayDuration' + 'TotalFridayDuration' + 'TotalSaturdayDuration'+'TotalSundayDuration'+'TotalMondayDuration'+'TotalTuesdayDuration'+'TotalWednesdayDuration') / 3600

computedFields.label: CurrentDate
computedFields.name: CurrentDate
computedFields.saqlExpression: now()

computedFields.name: ValidToWithNow
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'ValidToDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z" then now() else toDate('ValidToDate', "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") end

computedFields.name: OwnerDurationInHours
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Field' == "Owner"  or 'Field' == "created" then date_diff("hour",toDate(CreatedDate_sec_epoch),toDate(OwnerNextDate_sec_epoch)) else 0 end

computedFields.name: StatusDurationInHours
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Field' == "${Constants.CaseStatus}" or 'Field' == "created" then date_diff("hour",toDate(CreatedDate_sec_epoch),toDate(StatusNextDate_sec_epoch)) else 0 end

computedFields.name: NumWeeks
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('ValidToWithNow_day_epoch' - 'CreatedDate_day_epoch')< 2 then 0 else ('ValidToWithNow_day_epoch' - 'CreatedDate_day_epoch')/7 end

computedFields.name: StartWeekDay
computedFields.saqlExpression: 'CreatedDate_day_epoch'%7

computedFields.name: EndWeekDay
computedFields.saqlExpression: 'ValidToWithNow_day_epoch'%7

computedFields.name: TotalThursdayDuration
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ( ('EndWeekDay' < 'StartWeekDay') and ((0 < 'EndWeekDay') or (('StartWeekDay' < 0) and (0 < ('EndWeekDay'+7))))) or ('StartWeekDay' != 'EndWeekDay' && ('StartWeekDay' < 0 && 0< 'EndWeekDay')) then  'BH.ThursdayDuration'*('NumWeeks' + 1) else 'BH.ThursdayDuration'*'NumWeeks' end

computedFields.name: TotalFridayDuration
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ( ('EndWeekDay' < 'StartWeekDay') and ((1 < 'EndWeekDay') or (('StartWeekDay' < 1) and (1 < ('EndWeekDay'+7))))) or ('StartWeekDay' != 'EndWeekDay' && ('StartWeekDay' < 1 && 1< 'EndWeekDay')) then 'BH.FridayDuration'*('NumWeeks' + 1) else 'BH.FridayDuration'*'NumWeeks' end

computedFields.name: TotalSaturdayDuration
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ( ('EndWeekDay' < 'StartWeekDay') and ((2 < 'EndWeekDay') or (('StartWeekDay' < 2) and (2 < ('EndWeekDay'+7))))) or ('StartWeekDay' != 'EndWeekDay' && ('StartWeekDay' < 2 && 2< 'EndWeekDay')) then 'BH.SaturdayDuration'*('NumWeeks' + 1) else 'BH.SaturdayDuration'*'NumWeeks' end

computedFields.name: TotalSundayDuration
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ( ('EndWeekDay' < 'StartWeekDay') and ((3 < 'EndWeekDay') or (('StartWeekDay' < 3) and (3 < ('EndWeekDay'+7))))) or ('StartWeekDay' != 'EndWeekDay' && ('StartWeekDay' < 3 && 3< 'EndWeekDay')) then 'BH.SundayDuration'*('NumWeeks' + 1) else 'BH.SundayDuration'*'NumWeeks' end

computedFields.name: TotalMondayDuration
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ( ('EndWeekDay' < 'StartWeekDay') and ((4 < 'EndWeekDay') or (('StartWeekDay' < 4) and (4 < ('EndWeekDay'+7))))) or ('StartWeekDay' != 'EndWeekDay' && ('StartWeekDay' < 4 && 4< 'EndWeekDay')) then 'BH.MondayDuration'*('NumWeeks' + 1) else 'BH.MondayDuration'*'NumWeeks' end

computedFields.name: TotalTuesdayDuration
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ( ('EndWeekDay' < 'StartWeekDay') and ((5 < 'EndWeekDay') or (('StartWeekDay' < 5) and (5 < ('EndWeekDay'+7))))) or ('StartWeekDay' != 'EndWeekDay' && ('StartWeekDay' < 5 && 5< 'EndWeekDay')) then 'BH.TuesdayDuration'*('NumWeeks' + 1) else 'BH.TuesdayDuration'*'NumWeeks' end

computedFields.name: TotalWednesdayDuration
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ( ('EndWeekDay' < 'StartWeekDay') and ((6 < 'EndWeekDay') or (('StartWeekDay' < 6) and (6 < ('EndWeekDay'+7))))) or ('StartWeekDay' != 'EndWeekDay' && ('StartWeekDay' < 6 && 6< 'EndWeekDay')) then 'BH.WednesdayDuration'*('NumWeeks' + 1) else 'BH.WednesdayDuration'*'NumWeeks' end

computedFields.name: BusinessCreateDateStartTimeInSeconds
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'StartWeekDay' == 0 then 'BH.ThursdayStartTime_sec' when 'StartWeekDay' == 1 then 'BH.FridayStartTime_sec' when 'StartWeekDay' == 2 then 'BH.SaturdayStartTime_sec' when 'StartWeekDay' == 3 then 'BH.SundayStartTime_sec' when 'StartWeekDay' == 4 then 'BH.MondayStartTime_sec' when 'StartWeekDay' == 5 then 'BH.TuesdayStartTime_sec' when 'StartWeekDay' == 6 then 'BH.WednesdayStartTime_sec' else 'BH.WednesdayStartTime_sec' end

computedFields.name: BusinessCreateDateEndTimeInSeconds
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'StartWeekDay' == 0 then 'BH.ThursdayEndTime_sec' when 'StartWeekDay' == 1 then 'BH.FridayEndTime_sec' when 'StartWeekDay' == 2 then 'BH.SaturdayEndTime_sec' when 'StartWeekDay' == 3 then 'BH.SundayEndTime_sec' when 'StartWeekDay' == 4 then 'BH.MondayEndTime_sec' when 'StartWeekDay' == 5 then 'BH.TuesdayEndTime_sec' when 'StartWeekDay' == 6 then 'BH.WednesdayEndTime_sec' else 'BH.WednesdayEndTime_sec' end

computedFields.name: BusinessValidToStartTimeInSeconds
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'EndWeekDay' == 0 then 'BH.ThursdayStartTime_sec' when 'EndWeekDay' == 1 then 'BH.FridayStartTime_sec' when 'EndWeekDay' == 2 then 'BH.SaturdayStartTime_sec' when 'EndWeekDay' == 3 then 'BH.SundayStartTime_sec' when 'EndWeekDay' == 4 then 'BH.MondayStartTime_sec' when 'EndWeekDay' == 5 then 'BH.TuesdayStartTime_sec' when 'EndWeekDay' == 6 then 'BH.WednesdayStartTime_sec' else 'BH.WednesdayStartTime_sec' end

computedFields.name: BusinessValidToEndTimeInSeconds
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'EndWeekDay' == 0 then 'BH.ThursdayEndTime_sec' when 'EndWeekDay' == 1 then 'BH.FridayEndTime_sec' when 'EndWeekDay' == 2 then 'BH.SaturdayEndTime_sec' when 'EndWeekDay' == 3 then 'BH.SundayEndTime_sec' when 'EndWeekDay' == 4 then 'BH.MondayEndTime_sec' when 'EndWeekDay' == 5 then 'BH.TuesdayEndTime_sec' when 'EndWeekDay' == 6 then 'BH.WednesdayEndTime_sec' else 'BH.WednesdayEndTime_sec' end

computedFields.name: StartTimeAdjusted
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when (('CreatedDate_sec_epoch'-('CreatedDate_day_epoch'*86400)) > 'BusinessCreateDateEndTimeInSeconds') then 'BusinessCreateDateEndTimeInSeconds' when (('CreatedDate_sec_epoch'-('CreatedDate_day_epoch'*86400)) < 'BusinessCreateDateStartTimeInSeconds') then 'BusinessCreateDateStartTimeInSeconds' else ('CreatedDate_sec_epoch'-('CreatedDate_day_epoch'*86400)) end

computedFields.name: EndTimeAdjusted
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when (('ValidToWithNow_sec_epoch'-('ValidToWithNow_day_epoch'*86400)) > 'BusinessValidToEndTimeInSeconds') then 'BusinessValidToEndTimeInSeconds' when (('ValidToWithNow_sec_epoch'-('ValidToWithNow_day_epoch'*86400)) < 'BusinessValidToStartTimeInSeconds') then 'BusinessValidToStartTimeInSeconds' else ('ValidToWithNow_sec_epoch'-('ValidToWithNow_day_epoch'*86400)) end

computedFields.name: PartialDaysDurationStart
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('ValidToWithNow_day_epoch' == 'CreatedDate_day_epoch') then 0 else 'BusinessCreateDateEndTimeInSeconds' - 'StartTimeAdjusted' end

computedFields.name: PartialDaysDurationEnd
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('ValidToWithNow_day_epoch' == 'CreatedDate_day_epoch') then 'EndTimeAdjusted' - 'StartTimeAdjusted' else 'EndTimeAdjusted' - 'BusinessValidToStartTimeInSeconds' end

computedFields.label: Business Hours
computedFields.name: BusinessHours
computedFields.saqlExpression: ('PartialDaysDurationStart'+ 'PartialDaysDurationEnd'+ 'TotalThursdayDuration' + 'TotalFridayDuration' + 'TotalSaturdayDuration'+'TotalSundayDuration'+'TotalMondayDuration'+'TotalTuesdayDuration'+'TotalWednesdayDuration') / 3600

computedFields.label: New Status
computedFields.name: NewStatus
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Field' == "created" then "Created" when 'Field' == "${Constants.CaseStatus}" then 'NewValue' else"NA" end

computedFields.label: Old Status
computedFields.name: OldStatus
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Field' == "closed" then "Closed" when 'Field' == "${Constants.CaseStatus}" then 'OldValue' else "NA" end

computedFields.label: New Owner
computedFields.name: NewOwner
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Field' == "Owner" then 'NewValue' else"NA" end

computedFields.label: Old Owner
computedFields.name: OldOwner
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Field' == "Owner" then 'OldValue' else "NA" end

computedFields.label: Date Diff Old
computedFields.name: DateDiffOld
computedFields.saqlExpression: ('CreatedDate_sec_epoch' - 'CreatedDatePrev_sec_epoch')/86400

computedFields.label: Date Diff New
computedFields.name: DateDiffNew
computedFields.saqlExpression: case  when ('Case.IsClosed' == "true"  && CreatedDate <= 'Case.ClosedDate') then ('Case.ClosedDate_sec_epoch' - 'CreatedDate_sec_epoch')/86400   when ('Case.IsClosed' == "true" &&  CreatedDate > 'Case.ClosedDate') then 0 else ('ValidToWithNow_sec_epoch' - 'CreatedDate_sec_epoch')/86400 end

computedFields.label: Change After CloseDate
computedFields.name: ChangeAfterCloseDate
computedFields.saqlExpression: case  when ('Field' == "Owner" && 'CreatedDate' > 'Case.ClosedDate') then "true"  else "false" end

computedFields.label: Last Change
computedFields.name: IsLastChange
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('Case.ClosedDate' is null && 'ValidToDate' == "3000-10-10T10:10:10.100Z") then "true" when ('CreatedDate' <= 'Case.ClosedDate' && 'ValidToDate' > 'Case.ClosedDate') then "true" else "false" end

computedFields.label: CurrentDate
computedFields.name: CurrentDate
computedFields.saqlExpression: now()

computedFields.label: ValidToWithNow
computedFields.name: ValidToWithNow
computedFields.saqlExpression: case  when ('IsClosed' == "true") then toDate('ClosedDate', "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'") else now()  end

computedFields.label: StartTime_15Min
computedFields.name: StartTime_15Min
computedFields.saqlExpression: toDate(floor(StartTime_sec_epoch/900)*900)

computedFields.name: CSAT
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'CaseId' is null then -999 else 'Case.CSAT' end

expression.saqlExpression: case when 'AgentId' is null then previous('AgentIdFill') else current('AgentId') end

case when 'LCT.Status' == "Completed" && ('TempAgentChatEndTime_sec_epoch' == 'Time_sec_epoch') && ('Time_sec_epoch' != coalesce(previous('Time_sec_epoch'),0)) && (('Type' == "EndAgent") || ('Type' ==  "EndVisitor")  || ('Type' ==  "LeaveVisitor")) then "true" else "false" end
case when 'LCT.Status' == "Completed" && ((next('Type') == "Transfer") || (next('Type') ==  "OperatorJoinedConference")) then "true" else "false" end

computedFields.name: IsNextChatEventTransfer
computedFields.description: next chat event is going to be Transfer
computedFields.label: IsNextChatEventTransfer

expression.saqlExpression: case when 'LCT.Status' == "Completed" && (('Type' == "Accept") || ('Type' ==  "Transfer")  || ('Type' ==  "OperatorJoinedConference")) then coalesce(previous('AgentStartCount')+1,1) else coalesce(previous('AgentStartCount'),0) end
case when 'IsEndChatEvent' == "true" then coalesce(previous('AgentEndCount')+1,1) else coalesce(previous('AgentEndCount'),0) end
case when 'IsNextChatEventTransfer' == "true" then coalesce(previous('AgentTransferCount')+1,1) else coalesce(previous('AgentTransferCount'),0) end

computedFields.name: NumConcurrentChats
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'IsNextChatEventTransfer' == "true"  then 'AgentStartCount' - 'AgentEndCount'- 'AgentTransferCount' +1 else 'AgentStartCount' - 'AgentEndCount' - 'AgentTransferCount' end
computedFields.label: Number of Concurrent Chats

computedFields.name: IsChatTransfered
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'LCT.Status' == "Completed" && (('Type' == "Accept") || ('Type' ==  "Transfer")  || ('Type' ==  "OperatorJoinedConference")) && 'LCT.StartTime' != 'Time' then 1 else 0 end
computedFields.label: Is Chat Transfered

computedFields.name: AgentChatEndTime_sec_epoch
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'TempAgentChatEndTime_sec_epoch' == 'Time_sec_epoch' then 'LCT.EndTime_sec_epoch' else 'TempAgentChatEndTime_sec_epoch' end
computedFields.label: Agent Chat End Time

computedFields.name: AgentChatDuration
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'TempAgentChatEndTime_sec_epoch' == 'Time_sec_epoch' then 'LCT.EndTime_sec_epoch' - 'Time_sec_epoch' else 'TempAgentChatEndTime_sec_epoch' - 'Time_sec_epoch' end
computedFields.label: Agent Chat Duration

computedFields.name: CSAT
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Case.CreatedDate' is null then -999 else 'Case.CSAT' end
